markets.description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Jahmyr Gibbs is the top scoring flex player (RB/WR/TE) during the 2024 NFL season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

This market will be based on ESPN’s FFL Points Per Reception (PPR) scoring, and refers to the totals for the entirety of the 2024-2025 NFL regular season.

In case of a tie for the most points scored, this market will resolve in favor of the player whose last name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be ESPN Fantasy https://fantasy.espn.com/football/leaders.
markets.question: Will Jahmyr Gibbs be the top Fantasy Flex Player?

markets.description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any player other than Christian McCaffrey, CeeDee Lamb, Tyreek Hill, Jahmyr Gibbs, Ja’Marr Chase, Amon-Ra St. Brown, Bijan Robinson, Breece Hall, Justin Jefferson, A.J. Brown, Garrett Wilson, Puka Nacua, Jonathan Taylor, Saquon Barkley, or Derrick Henry is the top scoring flex player (RB/WR/TE) during the 2024 NFL season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.
